name: Yaminabe War !!
description:
Yaminabe war !!

WASD for move
left mouse for attack

How to play:
- Kill the monster and get the material.
- Throw the material into the Hotpot to get the score.

Credit:
Made by Eit_wc and Mr.P
Sound effect by lolamadeus
Background music by speedenza

** The meaning of Yaminabe is a hot pot eaten in the darkness and with mystery ingredients.
